indices.name: index_claims_claimFingerprint
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_claims_claimFingerprint` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`claimFingerprint`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `claimId` TEXT NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `fallacyIds` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` TEXT NOT NULL, `updatedAt` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`claimId`) REFERENCES `claims`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_rebuttals_claimId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`claimId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `claimId` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` TEXT NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `sourceId` TEXT, `quality` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` TEXT NOT NULL, `updatedAt` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`claimId`) REFERENCES `claims`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`sourceId`) REFERENCES `sources`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE SET NULL )

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `citation` TEXT, `url` TEXT, `publisher` TEXT, `date` TEXT, `reliabilityScore` REAL, `notes` TEXT, `createdAt` TEXT NOT NULL, `updatedAt` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_claims_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `claims` BEGIN DELETE FROM `claims_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_claims_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `claims` BEGIN DELETE FROM `claims_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_claims_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `claims` BEGIN INSERT INTO `claims_fts`(`docid`, `text`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`text`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_claims_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `claims` BEGIN INSERT INTO `claims_fts`(`docid`, `text`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`text`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`text` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`claims`)
